view_1.main_content: Welcome screen for Healthflex Loop healthcare platform featuring a telehealth consultation image and green/white color scheme
view_1.key_information: Offers unlimited healthcare from top 10% doctors with benefits designed to prevent hospitalization, includes personalized welcome message
view_1.required_action: User needs to click 'Next' button to proceed with onboarding
view_1.design_quality: Clean, modern design with professional color scheme, clear hierarchy, and good use of white space and imagery
view_1.friction_points: Limited information about specific benefits or coverage details, no immediate way to access more details about the top 10% doctors claim, progress indicator shows 1/8 screens which may seem lengthy

view_2.main_content: An onboarding screen highlighting 24/7 claims expert support service, featuring a green-themed layout with customer service representatives in a call center setting
view_2.key_information: The screen emphasizes round-the-clock support availability and complete assistance throughout the claims process from submission to settlement
view_2.required_action: User needs to navigate using 'Back' or 'Next' buttons at the bottom of the screen, with progress dots indicating step 2 of 8
view_2.design_quality: Clean, professional design with good use of brand colors (green), clear typography, and supporting imagery. Layout effectively combines text and visual elements
view_2.friction_points: Progress indicator shows this is only step 2 of 8, which might feel lengthy. No clear indication of what previous or next steps entail. Limited interactive elements on the screen

view_3.main_content: Welcome screen for health insurance registration showing a family looking at a device together, with the heading 'Easy registration to start your family's coverage'
view_3.key_information: The screen emphasizes quick enrollment process with the subheading 'Spend just a few minutes to enroll and unlock coverage and peace of mind'
view_3.required_action: User needs to click 'Get Started' button to proceed or 'Back' to return to previous screen
view_3.design_quality: Clean, professional design with good use of green brand colors, clear typography, and welcoming imagery that creates trust and comfort
view_3.friction_points: Limited information about what the actual registration process entails or how many steps are involved, which may cause uncertainty for users

view_4.main_content: Health insurance plan selection screen showing two options: Gold Management and Platinum Management, with detailed coverage information and pricing
view_4.key_information: Coverage details including sum insured (46L/20L), family structure options, maternity benefits, room rent limits, and various medical expense coverages. Prices start from ₹54,544 for Gold and ₹57,634 for Platinum plans
view_4.required_action: User needs to select between Gold or Platinum Management plans and choose their desired family structure from available options
view_4.design_quality: Clean, well-organized layout with clear plan comparison, good use of icons and hierarchical information display. Important notes highlighted at top
view_4.friction_points: Large amount of information to process, multiple coverage details to compare, family structure selection requires additional click on edit icon, premium variations based on structure may cause uncertainty

view_5.main_content: Health insurance plan selection screen showing two options - Gold Management and Platinum Management, with detailed coverage information and pricing
view_5.key_information: Coverage amounts (41L/48L sum insured), family structure options, maternity benefits, hospitalization coverage, and various medical expense details for both plans
view_5.required_action: User needs to select between Gold or Platinum plan, confirm family structure, and manage dependents before proceeding
view_5.design_quality: Clean, organized layout with clear plan comparison, good use of icons and spacing, helpful tooltips and expandable sections for detailed information
view_5.friction_points: Large amount of information to process, multiple expandable sections that require clicking, premium calculations that update automatically may cause confusion, dependency management might be complex for larger families

view_6.main_content: Health insurance plan selection screen showing two options: Gold Management and Platinum Management, with detailed coverage information and pricing
view_6.key_information: Coverage details for both plans including sum insured (40-47L), family structure options, maternity benefits, room rent, ambulance coverage, and various medical treatments. Premium amounts start from ₹54,544 for Gold and ₹57,634 for Platinum
view_6.required_action: User needs to select one of the two plans (Gold or Platinum) and proceed with 6 members already added to the policy. Total amount to pay is ₹95,671
view_6.design_quality: Clean, well-organized layout with clear comparison between plans. Good use of icons and expandable sections for detailed information. Professional color scheme with green theme
view_6.friction_points: Large amount of information to process, multiple expandable sections that require clicking to view full details, complex coverage terms that may need explanation, relatively high premium amount that might cause hesitation

view_8.main_content: Final review and confirmation screen for health insurance selection showing selected plans, dependents, and total costs
view_8.key_information: Group Medical Coverage (₹57,634), multiple add-on plans including health checkup, dental care, and pet care, total premium of ₹95,671 payable in 9 EMIs at ₹10,631/month
view_8.required_action: User must review selections and click 'Complete Registration' or optionally save as draft; can also change base plan or benefits if needed
view_8.design_quality: Clean, organized layout with clear pricing breakdown, good use of icons and sections to display different coverage components and family members
view_8.friction_points: Large amount of information to review, multiple add-ons may cause decision fatigue, EMI commitment might need more prominent display, edit mode warning could be clearer
